attributes.action: allow teachers to 'be there' for students who need them, ie. hugs/comforting
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Naturally it is only appropriate that there are teacher-student boundaries, ie no sexual relationships or harassment but we need to relax the boundaries a bit. Those who want to break the rules will anyway and it's a small percentage who do. But there are many kids who actually need their teachers as support - sometimes they need a hug and sometimes the only people they feel able to talk to is a particular teacher. they can't help connecting. they need responses from these teachers. they need them to listen and be there. don't let these kids suffer.
